trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Los Alamos
There were no other sightings in Los Alamos on or around March 19th 1993
Summary: Three very large disks landed into a huge whole in the ground.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on Pajarito Mesa at Los Alamos National Laboratory, when I saw three very large disks tilt 90 degrees and land into a hole that wasn't there just moments before. After they entered the enclosure, the hole disappeared. The disks were metalic with the colors of bright silver on top, the mid section was gray, and the lower section was black but with a metalic luster.
